title: how carry as support???
body: as its say, many supp Completely depend on the team, vision dont work if they dont look at the minimap, cc dont work if they miss all skill shot or focus minions??? any help??

replies.body: play a damage-focused support with heavy aoe cc. {{champion:63}} {{champion:26}} and {{champion:143}} can all carry you out of bronze because you won't need an adc/apc to carry fights for you
